snippet: The D.J.'s, Mel Greig and Michael Christian of the Sydney station 2Day FM, had duped nurses at King Edward VII Hospital into revealing information about Kate Middleton, the Duchess of Cambridge, who was being treated there for morning sickness.
abstract: The D.J.'s, Mel Greig and Michael Christian of the Sydney station 2Day FM, had duped nurses at King Edward VII Hospital into revealing information about Kate Middleton, the Duchess of Cambridge, who was being treated there for morning sickness.

headline.main: D.J.'s in Royal Hoax Flee Social Media After Nurse Dies
